pages.title: Temperature
pages.text: The thermometer in the top left indicates your temperature. Your surroundings gradually change your temperature over time. Bad things happen if you let it get too extreme.

pages.title: Biomes
pages.text: The nether, desert, mesa, jungle, savana, and swamps are hot. Taiga, anywhere icy and the end are cold.

pages.title: Blocks
pages.text: Being near fire, lava, lit furnaces or campfires will heat you up. Being near ice or in water will cool you down.

pages.title: Other Modifiers
pages.text: Being on fire or under y=10 heats you up. Being above y=100 cools you down. Wearing armor helps you stay warm in cool places. Drinking water helps you stay cool in warm places. Fire resistance makes you immune to heat. Time spent in neutral areas slowly brings you back to normal

pages.title: Negative Effects
pages.text: Being too hot gives you heat stroke which gives you nausea, weakness and eventually makes you burn to death. Being too cold gives you hypothermia which gives weakness, slowness, lower attack speed and deals damage over time.

pages.title: Charms
pages.text: You can craft charms to be immune to heat or cold. Look in JEI for recipes.
